document.discussion_title: Indian IT industry tightens employee performance parameters
document.topic_text: With growth faltering due to macroeconomic conditions and increasing use of automation and technology such as artificial intelligence, the IT services industry is increasingly looking to make performance evaluation more stringent. A recent news report stated that Infosys, country's second largest IT Services provider, has sacked 500 employees. The story said that some of these employees could not complete the required 9.15 hours of work every day.
